meanings.definition: To see or observe something outside of oneself.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys outseeing the birds in the park.
meanings.sent2: I like outseeing the stars at night.
meanings.sent3: Outseeing the squirrels play in the garden always brings a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: His mind was outseeing the possibilities beyond the horizon.
meanings.sent5: Outseeing the rainbow after the rain was a breathtaking experience.

meanings.definition: The act of seeing or observing something outside of oneself.
meanings.sent1: Her outseeing of the city's landmarks was truly memorable.
meanings.sent2: The outseeing of nature's beauty is a calming experience.
meanings.sent3: His outseeing of the parade made him feel like a part of the celebration.
meanings.sent4: The artist's outseeing of the world inspired his paintings.
meanings.sent5: The child's outseeing of the ocean filled her with wonder and awe.
